title: Jennifer Aniston cuddles up to musician Dave Matthews in new photos posted to her Instagram
text:
She 'broke the Internet' when she joined Instagram this week and posted a photo of herself with all five of her Friends co-stars.

And Jennifer Aniston seems to be embracing social media with gusto now she's taken the plunge.

On Wednesday, she delighted fans again when she posted a photo in which she's seen cuddling musician Dave Matthews.

Sharing: Jennifer Aniston, who joined Instagram on Tuesday, continued to delight her followers as she posted photos of herself cuddling musician Dave Matthews on Wednesday

'Love this man!' the actress, 50, wrote as she stands with her arms around Matthews, 52, who has one hand placed on her back.

In a second photo, shared via Instagram Stories, Aniston is seen gazing up at the rocker who stares directly at the camera.

The pair were both guests on ABC's Jimmy Kimmel Live and it appears the photos were snapped in the late night show's green room.

Feeling social: The actress, 50, stands with her arms around Matthews, 52, who has one hand placed on her back. The pair were both guests on ABC's Jimmy Kimmel Live Wednesday night

On Tuesday, Aniston shared the undated selfie with the Friends cast and in the caption, she wrote: 'And now we’re Instagram FRIENDS too. HI INSTAGRAM.'

The photo shows her holding the camera as Lisa Kudrow, Courteney Cox, David Schwimmer, Matt Le Blanc and Matthew Perry lean into the shot.

Her Instagram debut garnered 11.4 million likes and she now has 11 million followers.

New project: Aniston was on Kimmel to promote her upcoming Apple TV+ series The Morning Show which debuts on November 1

Aniston's decision to join Instagram coincides with the upcoming release of her Apple TV+ series The Morning Show.

She was on Kimmel to promote the show in which she stars with Reese Witherspoon; Aniston and Witherspoon also serve as executive producers.

The former Friends star plays a veteran anchor who finds herself in the spotlight when her male colleague is fired over sexual misconduct allegations.

Witherspoon is the local newswoman who joins Aniston's character as co-anchor of the network morning show.

The streaming service commissioned two seasons of The Morning Show straight off the bat and it's set to drop on Apple TV+ Plus on November 1.
